Komdis PSSI Jatuhkan 8 Hukuman: Persebaya Terberat
02 Nov 2019, 00:24 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Persebaya Surabaya dijatuhi hukuman menjalani pertandingan kandang dan tandang tanpa kehadiran penonton sampai akhir musim kompetisi Liga 1 2019. Hukuman itu dijatuhkan Komite Disiplin PSSI atau Komdis PSSI dalam sidang Kamis, 31 Oktober 2019.
Hukuman itu jatuh sebagai akibat dari kasus kerusuhan penonton saat Persebaya menjamu PSS Sleman pada 29 Oktober 2019 Saat itu, para penggemar Persebaya yang kecewa dengan kekalahan 2-3 dari tim tamu, mengamuk dengan merusak dan membakar papan iklan, serta mengejar para pemain.
Selain sanksi soal penonton, Persebaya juga dijatuhi denda sebesar Rp 200 juga karena kesalahannya itu.
Komdis PSSI juga menghukum Persebaya untuk kesalahan lain, yakni pelemparan botol oleh penonton saat berlaga di kandang Persela pada 23 Oktober. Untuk kesalahannya ini Bajul Ijo didenda Rp 45 ribu.
Sidang Komdis juga menjatuhkan sanksi denda terhadap sejumlah klub lain terkait pelanggaran-pelanggaran yang dilakukan mereka, terkait penyalaan suar oleh penonton, pelemparan botol oleh penonton, pelanggaran fair play, dan nyanyian lagu-lagu rasis. Klub-klub yang terkena hukuman tersebut adalah Persija Jakarta, Kalteng Putra, Perseru Badak Lampung, Persib Bandung, dan PSM Makassar.
Hasil Sidang Komite Disiplin PSSI, Kamis 31 Oktober 2019
1. Persebaya Surabaya- Nama kompetisi: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Pertandingan: Persela Lamongan vs Persebaya Surabaya- Tanggal kejadian: 23 Oktober 2019- Jenis pelanggaran: Pelemparan botol (pengulangan)- Hukuman: Denda Rp 45 juta.
2. Persebaya Surabaya- Nama kompetisi: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Pertandingan: Persebaya Surabaya vs PS Sleman- Tanggal kejadian: 29 Oktober 2019- Jenis pelanggaran: Penyalaan smoke bomb serta flare, perusakan bench pemain, perusakan dan membakar aboard serta melakukan pengejaran terhadap pemain Persebaya Surabaya- Hukuman: Larangan tanpa penonton pada saat laga home dan away sampai akhir musim kompetisi 2019 dan denda Rp 200 juta.
3. Persija Jakarta- Nama kompetisi: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Pertandingan: PSS Sleman vs Persija Jakarta- Tanggal kejadian: 24 Oktober 2019- Jenis pelanggaran: Penyalaan smoke bomb serta flare (pengulangan)- Hukuman: Denda Rp 150 juta.
4. Kalteng Putra- Nama kompetisi: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Pertandingan: Kalteng Putra vs Persela Lamongan- Tanggal kejadian: 27 Oktober 2019- Jenis pelanggaran: Melanggar fair play- Hukuman: Denda Rp 50 juta.
5. Pemain Persela Lamongan, Moch Zaenuri- Nama kompetisi: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Pertandingan: Kalteng Putra vs Persela Lamongan- Tanggal kejadian: 27 Oktober 2019- Jenis pelanggaran: Melakukan tindakan tidak sportif dan melanggar fair play- Hukuman: Larangan bermain sebanyak 1 (satu) pertandingan
6. Perseru Badak Lampung FC- Nama kompetisi: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Pertandingan: Perseru Badak Lampung FC vs Persipura Jayapura- Tanggal kejadian: 28 Oktober 2019- Jenis pelanggaran: Penyalaan flare dan pelemparan botol (pengulangan)- Hukuman: Denda Rp 100 juta.
7. Persib Bandung- Nama kompetisi: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Pertandingan: Persib Bandung vs Persija Jakarta- Tanggal kejadian: 28 Oktober 2019- Jenis pelanggaran: Bernyanyi dengan kalimat tidak patut, penyalaan flare dan smoke bomb (pengulangan)- Hukuman: Denda Rp 150 juta.
8. PSM Makassar- Nama kompetisi: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Pertandingan: Bhayangkara FC vs PSM Makassar- Tanggal kejadian: 29 Oktober 2019- Jenis pelanggaran: Pelemparan botol (pengulangan)- Hukuman Komdis PSSI: Denda Rp 45 juta.

PSSI Comdis Drops 8 Punishment: The toughest Persebaya
02 Nov 2019, 00:24 by Antara, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Persebaya Surabaya was sentenced to undergo a home and away match without spectators until the end of the 2019 League 1 season. The sentence was handed down by the PSSI Disciplinary Committee or the PSSI Komdis at a hearing on Thursday, October 31, 2019.
The sentence fell as a result of a case of crowd riots when Persebaya hosted PSS Sleman on October 29, 2019 At that time, fans of Persebaya were disappointed with the 2-3 defeat of the visitors, rampaging by damaging and burning billboards, and chasing the players.
In addition to sanctions about the audience, Persebaya was also sentenced to a fine of Rp 200 also for his mistakes.
The PSSI Commissioner also punished Persebaya for another mistake, which was the throwing of a bottle by the audience while competing in the Persela stable on October 23. For this mistake Bajul Ijo was fined Rp. 45 thousand.
The Komdis trial also imposed fines on a number of other clubs related to their violations, related to flare-up by spectators, bottle-throwing by spectators, fair play violations, and racist songs. The clubs affected by the sentence were Persija Jakarta, Central Kalimantan Putra, Perseru Badak Lampung, Persib Bandung, and PSM Makassar.
Results of the PSSI Disciplinary Committee Session, Thursday 31 October 2019
1. Persebaya Surabaya- Name of competition: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Match: Persela Lamongan vs Persebaya Surabaya- Date of incident: 23 October 2019- Type of violation: Bottle throwing (repetition) - Penalty: Penalty of IDR 45 million.
2. Persebaya Surabaya- Name of competition: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Match: Persebaya Surabaya vs PS Sleman- Date of incident: October 29, 2019- Type of violation: Ignition of smoke bombs and flares, destruction of player bench, vandalism and burning aboard as well as chasing players Persebaya Surabaya- Penalty: Prohibition without spectators during home and away matches until the end of the 2019 season and a fine of Rp. 200 million.
3. Persija Jakarta- Name of competition: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Match: PSS Sleman vs Persija Jakarta- Date of incident: October 24, 2019- Type of violation: Ignition of smoke bombs and flares (repetition) - Penalty: Penalty of IDR 150 million.
4. Kalteng Putra- Competition name: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Match: Kalteng Putra vs Persela Lamongan- Date of occurrence: 27 October 2019- Type of violation: Violating fair play- Penalty: Penalty of IDR 50 million.
5. Persela Lamongan player, Moch Zaenuri- Name of competition: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Match: Kalteng Putra vs Persela Lamongan- Date of incident: 27 October 2019- Type of violation: Committing unsportsmanlike actions and violating fair play- Penalty: Prohibition of playing as much as 1 (one) match
6. Perseru Rhinoceros Lampung FC- Name of competition: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Match: Perseru Rhinoceros Lampung FC vs Persipura Jayapura- Date of incident: 28 October 2019- Type of violation: Ignition of flares and throwing bottles (repetition) - Penalty: IDR 100 million fine .
7. Persib Bandung- Name of competition: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Match: Persib Bandung vs Persija Jakarta- Date of occurrence: 28 October 2019- Type of violation: Singing with inappropriate sentences, igniting flares and smoke bombs (repetition) - Penalty: Penalty of Rp 150 million.
8. PSM Makassar- Name of competition: Shopee Liga 1 2019- Match: Bhayangkara FC vs PSM Makassar- Date of incident: October 29, 2019- Type of violation: Bottle throwing (repetition) - PSSI Commisional Penalty: Penalty of IDR 45 million.
